scripts.dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development bun run qr && cross-env NODE_ENV=development concurrently -k -n server,client "bun --watch server/index.ts" "bun run --cwd client dev"
scripts.build: bun run build:client && bun run build:server
scripts.prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=production bun run qr && cross-env NODE_ENV=production bun run build && cross-env NODE_ENV=production ./app
